__e: Sir, Adrian Cross is dead and the override device is gone, but I know who has it.
And since there's no way she's actually Melanie Cross, then we probably shouldn't call her that.
- And when we do, maybe he can tell us who this Anderson Cross is.
When you get there go to the Sheriff's office and ask for Deputy Cross and give him this.
Tell Cross and Manning everything is clear down here. Tell them you have the girl.
We believe that Adrian Cross and his people are in possession of it.
